author: trent_vanepps
content:
we're planning the next Merge Community call for June 3 - 1400 UTC (10 EST).

it would be great to have at least one contributor for each client (EL + CL) + a few researchers be present to field questions. DM me your email address if you'd like to join, and i can add you to the calendar invite

https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/532

author: timbeiko
content: Note, we just agreed on the CL call to leave TTD for Ropsten **as chosen last week**, and we will add additional hashrate to the network to make sure we hit it around June 8

author: timbeiko
content: Can someone review this PR to confirm that the fork hash on Ropsten not being changed means we keep using the one from London (given Arrow Glacier didn't happen on Ropsten), and that the value is correct? Thanks ðŸ˜„  https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/pull/520
